segments.source_content: For React-Native developers, don't miss [React-Native-Connection](https://reactnativeconnection.io/) on June 1st in Paris! I participated to the talks selection committee, and we just [published the complete line-up](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1648269027318411264) with international and local speakers. 10% discount with the code "REACTHEBDO".

segments.source_content: With React-admin you can not only save valuable time, but you can also become a better developer! You don't have to take only our word for it, though. There are already over 20,000 developers who use it daily and swear by its effectiveness. And if you're curious about the experiences of developers who have used React-admin for years already, check out NPO [Caritas' testimonial](https://marmelab.com/blog/2022/07/07/react-admin-caritas.html).

segments.source_content: An important TypeScript release that will allow React to be able to declare its own valid JSX types. It is planned to use this new feature as soon as possible in React typedefs, which have already been [forked](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/65126) to continue to support older versions (TypeScript \<= 5.0).

translations.fr: Une version majeure de TypeScript qui permettra Ã  React de dÃ©clarer ses propres types JSX valides. Il est prÃ©vu d'utiliser cette nouvelle fonctionnalitÃ© dÃ¨s que possible dans les typedefs React, qui ont dÃ©jÃ  Ã©tÃ© [forkÃ©s](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/65126) pour continuer Ã  supporter les anciennes versions (TypeScript â‰¤ 5.0).
translations.en: Une version importante de TypeScript qui permettra Ã  React de dÃ©clarer ses propres types JSX valides. Il est prÃ©vu d'utiliser cette nouvelle fonctionnalitÃ© dÃ¨s que possible dans les typedefs de React, qui ont dÃ©jÃ  Ã©tÃ© [forkÃ©s](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/65126) pour continuer Ã  prendre en charge les versions antÃ©rieures (TypeScript \<= 5.0).

segments.source_content: There are good reasons to adopt TypeScript 5.1+ as soon as possible. It unlocks among other things:

segments.source_content:
- the ability to use a React Server Component `async` in JSX without TypeScript errors or [workaround](https://gist.github.com/cramforce/b5e3f0b103f841d2e5e429b1d5ac4ded).
- the ability to return all valid types for `ReactNode` (string, array, boolean...) without needing a fragment ([details](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1648619398259769344)).
- other interesting improvements around JSX: namespaced attributes and linked editing (VSCode).

translations.fr:
- la possibilitÃ© d'utiliser un React Server Component `async` dans JSX sans erreurs TypeScript ni [contournement](https://gist.github.com/cramforce/b5e3f0b103f841d2e5e429b1d5ac4ded).
- la possibilitÃ© de retourner tous les types valides pour `ReactNode` (string, tableau, boolÃ©en...) sans besoin d'un fragment ([dÃ©tails](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1648619398259769344)).
- d'autres amÃ©liorations intÃ©ressantes autour de JSX : attributs avec espace de noms et Ã©dition liÃ©e (VSCode).
translations.en:
- d'utiliser un composant serveur React `async` dans JSX sans erreurs TypeScript ou [contournement](https://gist.github.com/cramforce/b5e3f0b103f841d2e5e429b1d5ac4ded).
- de renvoyer tous les types valides pour `ReactNode` (chaÃ®ne, tableau, boolÃ©en...) sans nÃ©cessiter de fragment ([dÃ©tails](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1648619398259769344)).
- d'autres amÃ©liorations intÃ©ressantes autour de JSX : attributs avec espace de noms et Ã©dition liÃ©e (VSCode).

segments.source_content: React-Query will remove the callbacks (`onSuccess`, `onError`, `onSettled`) from the `useQuery` hook with v5. Dominik explains this choice and suggest alternatives more adapted to common cases, like displaying a toast. A controversial but necessary decision because these APIs were often misused. Note: callbacks are kept for `useMutation`.

translations.fr: React-Query supprimera les callbacks (`onSuccess`, `onError`, `onSettled`) du hook `useQuery` dans la version 5. Dominik explique ce choix et propose des alternatives mieux adaptÃ©es aux cas courants, comme l'affichage d'une notification. Une dÃ©cision controversÃ©e mais nÃ©cessaire car ces API Ã©taient souvent mal utilisÃ©es. Note : les callbacks sont conservÃ©s pour `useMutation`.
translations.en: React-Query supprimera les callbacks (`onSuccess`, `onError`, `onSettled`) du hook `useQuery` avec la v5. Dominik explique ce choix et propose des alternatives mieux adaptÃ©es aux cas courants, comme afficher une notification. Une dÃ©cision controversÃ©e mais nÃ©cessaire car ces API Ã©taient souvent mal utilisÃ©es. Note : les callbacks sont conservÃ©s pour `useMutation`.

segments.source_content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!

segments.source_content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.

segments.source_content:
- [Node.js 20 Now Available](https://openjsf.org/blog/2023/04/18/node-js-20-now-available/): with stable test runner, permission model, compiling to executable binary...
- [pretty-ts-errors](https://github.com/yoavbls/pretty-ts-errors): great idea to improve the TS DX in VSCode.
- [total-typescript/shoehorn - Partial mocks in TypeScript](https://github.com/total-typescript/shoehorn)
- [Chrome ships WebGPU](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/webgpu-release/): in Chrome 113+.
- [WebGPU Fundamentals](https://webgpufundamentals.org/)
- [Turborepo 1.9](https://twitter.com/turborepo/status/1646238976196444162)
